entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Speedglas Line
Price: 3.88

[shortdesc]

3M Speedglas Inside Protection Plate, 9100XX, 06-0200-30

  • 3M™ Speedglas™ Inside Protection Plate 9000X/XF is designed to help protect the inside surface of the filter from spark and spatter
  • Failure to use an inside protection plate with the filter voids the warranty if spark or spatter cause damage to the glass
  • 3M™ Speedglas™ Inside Protection Plate 06-0200-30 is a replacement part for 3M™ Speedglas™ Filters 9100XX.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

entry.title: 3M Weld-Thru 05917-12.75OZ - Weld-Thru Ii Coating 5917 12.75 Oz. (36 G) 7000142694
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Welding Other
Price: 41.90

[shortdesc]

3M Weld-Thru II Coating, 5917, 12.75 oz. (361 g)

  • 3M™ Weld-Thru II Coating, 5917, is a sprayable, weldable, corrosion-resistant coating designed to prevent corrosion from forming between two welded metal surfaces
  • Additionally, this product can be used to prevent corrosion on metal surfaces that will not be receiving any further treatment, including body filler, primer and paint
  • However, for non-weld mating surfaces, products such as primer/paint, 3M™ Undercoatings or 3M™ Rust Fighter will provide a higher level of corrosion protection.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Weld-Thru
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Welding Other

    Extra Product Information

  • The 3M™ Weld-Thru Ii Coating 05917 dries fast with minimum spatter, and meets MIR requirements
  • This aerosol coating is designed to be applied to metal surfaces prior to welding to provide corrosion protection after welding
  • This 3M™ Weld-Thru Ii Coating

    • Product Information

  • Dries quickly
  • Easy to weld
  • Consistent sprayability
  • Minimal spatter

    • Suggested Application

  • Used to prevent corrosion between two metal surfaces
  • May also be used for non-cosmetic areas where additional corrosion protection is required
    		•
